name: Methods: The Canada Files (itch)
description:
In the last few stages of the Canadian detective competition, Detective Larika Downs is determined to find out who could be running such a questionable contest. Joining her are Detectives Tads, Anadyne, Struess, and Viu. By working together, will they find out the truth?

Methods: The Canada Files is a prequel visual novel to Methods: The Detective Competition. It features a new style of mystery-solving gameplay designed to present more of a challenge than the first game.

Playing Methods: The Detective Competition first is highly recommended, but not required to understand the story.

This game is in Early Access. The price of the game will increase as more content is added. Anyone who buys the game during the Early Access period will get all of the content in the full version at no additional cost.

  • Solve crimes with five unique methods
  • Refute faulty theories with evidence
  • Chinese translation (COMING SOON!)
  • Original soundtrack
  • Interviews, bios, gallery, music room, and other extra content (COMING SOON!)
